newsitem.title: UK: Epic Energy in Ukraine JV with Niko Resources.
newsitem.headline: Epic Energy in Ukraine JV with Niko Resources.

text.p: Calgary-based Epic Energy Inc and Niko Resources Ltd have agreed to a joint exploration programme in Ukraine's Crimean peninsula, the companies said on Wednesday.

A statement faxed to Reuters in London said a number of prospects have been identified in the area and Niko Resources agreed to fund a drilling programme on two prospects. "Upon completion, Niko Resources will earn 50 percent of Epic's interest in those prospects".
The drilling programme would begin in August assuming the timely issuance of permits under existing licences.

Epic's subsidiary is party to a production sharing agreement with its Ukraine partner, Krymgeologia, covering onshore Crimea, an area of 11,000 sq miles with substantial hydrocarbon accumulations, the companies said.
Niko is an international company which has significant oil and gas production in India and exploration interests in Cuba, the statement said.
